sentences.sentence: His obituary was published in one edition of his own newspaper before it was discovered that he was alive.
sentences.translation: 他的讣文刊登在他自己的报纸版面上之后，才发现他还活着。

sentences.sentence: Jano ran an obituary in the newspaper.
sentences.translation: 哈诺在报纸上登了讣告。

sentences.sentence: The Scheme: When times get tough, write your obituary.
sentences.translation: 方案：当时间不允许时，撰写你的讣告。
